casebody.data:
UNITED STATES, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Frank MIANO, Defendant-Appellant. No. 263. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit Feb. 1, 1937. Richard A. Grimm, of Buffalo, N. Y., for appellant. George L. Grobe, U. S. Atty., of Buffalo, N. Y. (Robert M. Hitchcock, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Dunkirk, N. Y., of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court
